comments.comment: Thopen ahanna thiyenne .. ehemada aasa kiyala thamai . Balaagena hitapiyau . Thopita oona widihata thawath merate natili natanna denne naa. Thopi wage paaharainta baye me rate janayaa jeewathwiya yuthu naa. Hitapiyauko ohoma udapana pana .thawa tika dawasai oya okkoma natum. Apa siyallan ithaa honda nuwanin , buddhiyen katayuthu kalayuthui.kese hoo ape haamuduruwan wahansela samaga ekaraashee wee me rata aarakshaa karagatha yuthui. Rate kaalakanni paalakainta  me gana kisidu aba atayak tharamwath hangeemak naa. Eka apa siyalu dena hindin awabhoda karagatha yuthui.

comments.comment: asaad saali saha ravi karunanayaka ratata pennuve edenna tamai udav keruve knaanasara haamduruvanva hiren eliyata ganna kiyala, ( saamanyen nayek kalayak athulata daala eliyata ganna issara dannava nayata dashta karanava puluvan eliyata gattama kiyala, mokada ehema thamai nayage swabhavaya) ethakota asaad danne nadda (totta baba) me haamduruvo eliyata avama me vage velaavakata navatha haamduruvan purudu vada kotasama thami karanna yanne kiyala? Eyava me velaave eliyata gattet okatama thamai. Assad kiyanne mottayek kiyala penava, game kaarayek, passa levakanna vitarai unta puruduvela tiyenne tanaturak laba ganna. comments.comment: Dont say all 225 in it. And spoil everyoones name only u.n.p , j.v.p and m.ps who followed sirisena chandrika from s.l.f.p were traitors.Some politicions like rajapakses defeated l.t.t.e without stopping war. Only u.n.p  and j.v,p should be wipe out from politics and chandrikas set of s.l.f.p premadasa chandrika and j.r jayawardana and ranil. Surpported l.t.t.e our ranaviru were not allowed to defeat l.t.t.e listning to india and west and bmaking peace talk every time army was going to win. It was rajapakses who allowed army to contoinue. Why do people say all 225 are same. This is because younger people did not know what u.n.p did from 1977 to 1994 brought robbery and murder into politics .mthey put tamil and muslim above sinhalese. Chandrika too did same  put ashraff badurudin high up. Rajapakse too had to tolerate them because they were in the s.l.f.p government. But chandrika , rajitha senerathna ravi kkarunanayake sirisena  made a coup to back stab rajapakses. Muslims and badurudin were already angry with giotabaya for deporting islam teachers. So they joined sirisena and u.n.p . And said lot of lies about rajapaksexs through gossip web sites imprisoned ven ghanasara .  Dragged rajapakse family to f.c.c.id. Calling them thieves. Those are the only work u.n.p and sirisena did. While isis were planning to iill  sinhalese  and convert everyone to islam and a gynocologist was doing l.t.g tube tying operation on sinhalese women. To reduce sinhalese population . One muslim man had 28 children by 4 wives while sinhala family had one child each. Government should ban all shariya laws and have one law for everyone . One man one wife. And limit killing bulls and cows or ban that. Nagananda is the one who advise people not to vote for all 225 putting what u.n.p did on others for his own agenda. . He also is not honest as he  advertise himself . Be care ful of this unknown angel can be worse than known devils.
comments.author: ranee ranatunga
